verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm חֶֽסֶד־ <S%H2617><s%> of mercy וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment אָשִׁ֑ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee O LORD אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <S%H2167><s%> will I sing

אַשְׂכִּ֤ילָה ׀ <S%H7919><s%> I will behave myself wisely בְּדֶ֬רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way תָּמִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> in a perfect מָ֭תַי <S%H4970><s%> When תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> O when wilt thou come אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me אֶתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> unto me? I will walk בְּתָם־ <S%H8537><s%> with a perfect לְ֝בָבִ֗י <S%H3824><s%> heart בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> within בֵּיתִֽי׃ <S%H1004><s%> my house

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אָשִׁ֨ית ׀ <S%H7896><s%> I will set לְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before עֵינַ֗י <S%H5869><s%> before mine eyes דְּֽבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> thing בְּלִ֫יָּ֥עַל <S%H1100><s%> no wicked עֲשֹֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> the work סֵטִ֥ים <S%H7750><s%> of them that turn aside שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <S%H8130><s%> I hate לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> no יִדְבַּ֣ק <S%H1692><s%> [it] shall not cleave בִּֽי׃

לֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> heart עִ֭קֵּשׁ <S%H6141><s%> A froward יָס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> shall depart מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at רָ֝֗ע <S%H7451><s%> a wicked לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no אֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> from me I will not know

[מְלֹושְׁנִי כ] (מְלָשְׁנִ֬י <S%H3960><s%> accuse ק) בַסֵּ֨תֶר ׀ <S%H5643><s%> Whoso privily רֵעֵהוּ֮ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour אוֹת֪וֹ <S%H853><s%> אַ֫צְמִ֥ית <S%H6789><s%> him will I cut off גְּֽבַהּ־ <S%H1362><s%> him that hath an high עֵ֭ינַיִם <S%H5869><s%> look וּרְחַ֣ב <S%H7342><s%> and a proud לֵבָ֑ב <S%H3824><s%> heart אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No אוּכָֽל׃ <S%H3201><s%> will not I suffer

עֵינַ֤י ׀ <S%H5869><s%> Mine eyes בְּנֶֽאֶמְנֵי־ <S%H539><s%> [shall be] upon the faithful אֶרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> of the land לָשֶׁ֪בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that they may dwell עִמָּ֫דִ֥י <S%H5978><s%> who הֹ֭לֵךְ <S%H1980><s%> with me he that walketh בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way תָּמִ֑ים <S%H8549><s%> in a perfect ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> is the one יְשָׁרְתֵֽנִי׃ <S%H8334><s%> he shall serve

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֵשֵׁ֨ב ׀ <S%H3427><s%> shall not dwell בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> within בֵּיתִי֮ <S%H1004><s%> my house עֹשֵׂ֪ה <S%H6213><s%> He that worketh רְמִ֫יָּ֥ה <S%H7423><s%> deceit דֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> he that telleth שְׁקָרִ֑ים <S%H8267><s%> lies לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִ֝כּ֗וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall not tarry לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before עֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> in my sight

לַבְּקָרִ֗ים <S%H1242><s%> I will early אַצְמִ֥ית <S%H6789><s%> destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רִשְׁעֵי־ <S%H7563><s%> all the wicked אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לְהַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> that I may cut off מֵֽעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> from the city יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> doers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> all wicked
